page.title: 14Religion.
page.content: In Whitchurch there are six churches of various denominations including Catholic,Baptist,Methodist,Church of Wales and Mormon.In Tongwynlais there are four churches and one chapel.St. Michael's Church in Wales is the largest.There are two Baptist Churches Salem(1862) and Ainon(1827),a Presbyterian Church Hermon(1860) & Bethesda United Reformed Church(1861). Bethel, a Calvanistic Methodist Church in Morganstown has Sunday School at 2:00pm,services at 10:30am and 6:00pm. Radyr has a Methodist church and The Christ Church in Wales.55% of the children attend either Sunday School or a service on most Sundays.A small number are choir boys or altar boys. Elinor says that we go to church to listen and learn about Jesus and to say sorry for the naughty things we have done.
